snippet.title: XCOM: Chimera Squad - Official Game Soundtrack
snippet.description:
Listen to the official game soundtrack for XCOM: Chimera Squad. Subscribe to the XCOM channel for more gameplay videos and info from the devs: http://2kgam.es/XCOMYT

XCOM: Chimera Squad - Official Game Soundtrack track list: 

01 Welcome to City 31
02 Protect the Mayor
03 Prepare to Breach!
04 Chimera Squad - Act 1
05 The Progeny
06 Fire from the Sky
07 Mercenaries
08 Fragile Minds
09 Her Silver Shade Appears
10 Take Down The Progeny
11 Chimera Squad - Act 2
12 Gray Phoenix
13 Interlopers
14 Squad Tactics
15 Taking Flight
16 Our Freedom Awaits
17 Take Down Gray Phoenix
18 Chimera Squad - Act 3
19 Sacred Coil
20 The Bonded Stair
21 Tactical Assault
22 Soon, Our Redemption!
23 From the Depths
24 Take Down Sacred Coil
25 Got You Covered
26 Unknown Assailants
27 Battle for City 31

Watch the Gameplay Overview video ► https://youtu.be/39fhpegVBQQ

FOLLOW US: 
OFFICIAL WEBSITE ► https://xcom.com/
TWITTER ► https://twitter.com/XCOM
FACEBOOK ► https://www.facebook.com/XCOM/
INSTAGRAM ► https://www.instagram.com/xcomgame/

SUBSCRIBE for more videos ► http://2kgam.es/XCOMYT

ABOUT XCOM: CHIMERA SQUAD
After years of alien rule, humanity won the war for Earth. But when the Overlords fled the planet, they left their former soldiers behind. Now, five years after the events of XCOM 2, humans and aliens are working together to forge a civilization of cooperation and coexistence.

Welcome to City 31, a model of peace in a post-invasion world. However, not all of Earth's inhabitants support interspecies alliance. Chimera Squad, an elite force of human and alien agents, must work together to destroy the underground threats driving the city toward chaos.

Your agents are unique: each of them equipped with special tactical abilities and driven by a different motivation for joining Chimera Squad. Deploy targeted team members to investigate and combat the dangers that pervade the districts of City 31. 

Lead Chimera Squad through a new experience that innovates on XCOM's turn-based legacy, utilizing strategy, teamwork, and new breach-and-clear gameplay to complete your mission objectives.

The future of City 31 depends on you.

#XCOM #ChimeraSquad
